name: Christmas Commandeer
description:
Fight waves of Christmas related enemies to earn candy and purchase new weapons and unlock new areas. Find all five pieces of the sleigh to discover the escape door and save Christmas.

Story:

A young child travelled to the north in search of Santa Claus but was disappointed to discover the sleigh in pieces since Santa Claus has decided that no one will receive gifts this year. 

Due to Santa's refusal to deliver gifts, you must deliver them yourself. Santa, however, will not tolerate this and will send his minions to stop you.

I did not get enough time to implement enemy sounds so just pretend they are making sounds, For example penguins were going to make kazoo sounds.
